name: Rockaway Halal
halal_reasoning: Listed on Yelp as halal restaurant in Queens. 'Halal' in name is strong indicator. Phone listed as (908) 502-6380. Limited detailed verification available but name branding and Yelp categorization support halal status. Source: Yelp listing.

name: Rockaway Roti Shop
halal_reasoning: Website and Instagram (@rockawayroti) confirm '100% Zabiha Halal.' Described as 'South Ozone Park's source for flavorful West Indian, Guyanese, & Chinese cuisine' and 'Biggest Roti Shop in New York.' Operating since 2005. Sources: rockawayrotishop.com, HalalRun listing.

name: Rockland Halal Gyro
halal_reasoning: Halal food truck in Spring Valley. Confirmed 'all meat is halal' and alcohol-free per multiple sources. Listed on HalalRun and Halalify. Strong reviews praising authentic halal Middle Eastern food. Sources: Yelp, HalalRun, Halalify.com.

name: Rokstar Chicken
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal-certified Korean fried chicken chain. Website states 'Halal Certified, 100% All Natural' chicken. All chicken items are halal. Note: beef dumplings are NOT halal (handled separately). Machine-slaughtered. Sources: rokstarchicken.com, Instagram @rokstarchicken, TikTok @muslimfoodies.

name: Rokstar Chicken
halal_reasoning: Same chain as Douglaston location. Bronx location confirmed halal-certified. All chicken is halal (beef dumplings excluded). Sources: rokstarchicken.com, Instagram @rokstarchicken.

name: Rooh's BBQ Smoked Meat & Steakhouse
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal steakhouse per Yelp listing and Instagram (@roohs_smoked_meat_steak_house). Described as 'Long Island's newest Smoked meat BBQ halal smokehouse.' Categorized as Halal Steakhouse. Sources: Yelp, Instagram.

name: Roro's Gyro
halal_reasoning: Listed as Halal restaurant on Yelp along with Gyro/Mediterranean categories. Family-run Greek eatery with 4.7 Google rating. Health score 99/100. Sources: Yelp listing.

name: Rose's River Deli
halal_reasoning: Yelp description states 'Everything is homemade from our Halal gyros to our falafel.' Listed under Halal/Sandwiches/Breakfast on Yelp. Note: menu also includes non-halal items like pulled pork. Sources: Yelp listing.

name: Roti Paradise
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Caribbean restaurant. Listed as Halal on Uber Eats (4.5 rating, 900+ reviews) and multiple delivery platforms. Categorized as 'Halal, West Indian, Indian Curry, Caribbean.' Sources: Uber Eats, Yelp, Grubhub.

name: Rowdy Rooster
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Indian fried chicken restaurant from Roni Mazumdar and Chintan Pandya. Multiple sources confirm halal status. First Indian fried chicken specialist in NYC. Sources: rowdyrooster.com, Yelp, The Infatuation, TikTok.

name: Royal Fried Chicken
halal_reasoning: Listed as Halal on Yelp and multiple delivery platforms. Categorized as Fast Food, Comfort Food, and Halal. Open 24 hours. Sources: Yelp, DoorDash, Grubhub.

name: Royal Grill Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Established halal cart since 2005 at 44th St and 6th Ave. Website confirms halal status. Won award for best Food Vendor in NYC. Multiple locations including Madison Ave. Sources: royalhalalgrill.com, Yelp (611 reviews).

name: Royal Palace
halal_reasoning: Indian restaurant listed on HalalRun and HalalCaters. Website mentions halal options available. Established 1982. Serves halal meals including chicken tikka masala. Sources: HalalRun, royalpalacecuisines.com, halalcaters.com.

name: Royal Pizza
halal_reasoning: Pakistani family-owned pizzeria with extensive halal options. Website confirms '100% HALAL & vegetarian' cheese pizza. Offers halal pepperoni, halal meatballs, halal sausage, halal chicken wings. Non-halal ham also available. Sources: royalpizzaofronkonkoma.com, Slice.

name: Royal Roti Shop
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal roti shop established 2022. Website describes 'Newest Halal Roti Shop in Baldwin NY.' Trinidadian-Indian cuisine with halal menu. Asian-owned and Black-owned. Sources: Yelp, Instagram @royalrotishop, Tripadvisor.

name: Ruzana
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Middle Eastern restaurant in Brooklyn. Women-owned Palestinian establishment. Multiple sources confirm halal status. Described as 'First Arabic Shawarma in Brooklyn.' Sources: Yelp, foodjoyy.com, restaurantji.com.

name: S Broadway Fried Chicken
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal per multiple sources. Listed on Zabihah, HalalRun, and HalalCaters. 'All meat is halal' and alcohol-free. Halal sign visible on premises. Health Score 100/100. Sources: Zabihah, HalalRun, HalalCaters.

name: Sabry's
halal_reasoning: Acclaimed Egyptian halal seafood restaurant in Astoria's Little Egypt. Official website confirms halal. Chef Sabry from Alexandria, Egypt. No alcohol served. Located across from mosque on Steinway St. Sources: sabrys-seafood.com, Yelp (427 reviews), Gothamist.

name: Sabys Halal
halal_reasoning: Official website confirms halal. Serves Middle Eastern/Mediterranean cuisine. Features marinated meats with herbs, olive oil, lemon. Sources: sabyshalal.com, Yelp, DoorDash.

name: Safari
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Somali restaurant in Harlem. First and only Somali restaurant in NYC. All meats are halal. Located in Le Petit Senegal. Opened 2014. Sources: safariharlem.com, Wikipedia, The Infatuation, NYC Tourism.

name: Saffron Indian Cuisine
halal_reasoning: No address provided. Note says 'Chicken reportedly halal' but cannot verify without location. May be duplicate of Astoria location. Insufficient evidence to determine full halal status.

name: Saffron Indian Cuisine
halal_reasoning: Astoria location confirmed halal. Listed on Zabihah halal directory. Yelp and MenuPages categorize under Halal. Multiple reviews confirm halal status. Sources: Zabihah, Yelp, MenuPages, restaurantji.com.

name: Safir Mediterranean
halal_reasoning: Official website confirms '100% halal.' Owner confirmed full menu is halal per user note. Turkish/Mediterranean cuisine. Opened 2021. Sources: safir-mediterranean.com, LIC Partnership, Yelp (136 reviews).

name: Sagar Chinese
halal_reasoning: Official website (sagarchinese.com) confirms halal. Described as 'New York renowned Halal Indian-style Chinese and Asian Fusion Restaurant' since 2008. Bengali-style Chinese. Sources: sagarchinese.com, Yelp, Tripadvisor.

name: Sagar Chinese
halal_reasoning: Jackson Heights location - same chain. Official website confirms halal status. Indian-style Hakka Chinese cuisine. Sources: sagarchinese.com.

name: Sagar Chinese
halal_reasoning: Jamaica location - same chain. Official website confirms halal status. Sources: sagarchinese.com.

name: Sagar Chinese - Bellerose
halal_reasoning: Bellerose location at 252-05 Union Tpke. Same halal chain. Official website confirms. Sources: sagarchinese.com, Yelp (303 reviews).

name: Sagar Chinese - Jackson Heights
halal_reasoning: Jackson Heights at 74-19 37th Ave. Same halal chain. Official website confirms. Sources: sagarchinese.com, Yelp (185 reviews).

name: Sagar Chinese - Jamaica
halal_reasoning: Jamaica at 87-47 Homelawn St. Same halal chain. Official website confirms. Sources: sagarchinese.com, netwaiter listing.

name: Sahara Grill Food Cart
halal_reasoning: Halal cart on Rockaway Blvd. 'Halal' typically in name suggests halal food cart. Limited specific verification but consistent with halal cart naming conventions. Sources: Uber Eats listing.

name: Sahara Halal Cart
halal_reasoning: Halal in name. Food cart at 253rd St and Hillside Ave. Consistent with halal cart naming conventions in Queens. Limited specific info available.

name: Sahara Halal Food Cart
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal cart in Forest Hills. Located at 107-16 71st Ave. Strong reviews on Yelp (77 reviews). Known for generous portions, combo over rice. Open late. Sources: Yelp, Foursquare.

name: Sahara Mini Market Halal Deli & Grill
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal deli/market in Staten Island. Listed as Grocery/Halal/Deli on Yelp. Serves halal sandwiches including 'Sahara Philly Cheese Steak Halal.' Sources: Yelp, Uber Eats.

name: Sal's
halal_reasoning: Has halal breakfast options per Yelp. Offers turkey sausage and turkey bacon as alternatives. Known for breakfast sandwiches in Crown Heights. Not fully halal but halal-friendly options available. Sources: Yelp.

name: Salah's Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal. Official website salahshalalfood.com. Named after owner's late father. Sri Lankan owner. Strong reviews. Sources: Yelp, salahshalalfood.com, Instagram @salahs_halal_food.

name: Salim Biryani Kabab & Sweets
halal_reasoning: Confirmed 100% halal, HMS certified. Bangladeshi restaurant specializing in biryani. Known for Kacchi Biryani. Multiple sources confirm halal status. Sources: Yelp, DoorDash, multiple review sites.

name: Sally's Seafood Station
halal_reasoning: Unable to find specific restaurant at this address. No halal information found. May be Sally's Fish and Things (Caribbean/Jamaican seafood) but location doesn't match. Insufficient evidence.

name: Salma
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Lebanese restaurant in East Village. Official website salmaeastvillage.com. Listed as Halal on multiple platforms. Known for lamb shawarma. Sources: salmaeastvillage.com, Yelp (235 reviews), Uber Eats.

name: sam food castle
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal deli in Rockaway. Claims 'best halal food in town.' Serves lamb/chicken gyros, falafel over rice. Opened 2018. Reviews confirm halal status. Sources: Yelp, Restaurantji.

name: Sam's Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Halal cart on Ditmars Blvd. 'Halal' in name. Serves halal sandwiches, salads, platters. Open 4:30am-9:30pm. Sources: Yelp.

name: Sam's Hot Chicken
halal_reasoning: Confirmed Zabiha halal certified by SBNY (Shariah Board NY). Nashville-style hot chicken. Listed on SBNY certification database. Known for late night suhoor service. Cash only. Sources: sbny.org/listing.php?id=223, GoTayyib.

name: Sam's Steak & Grill
halal_reasoning: Confirmed Zabiha halal steakhouse. Website states 'First ever Halal Steak in Valley Stream & Long Island.' Menu confirms 'all steaks are US Grade Choice Halal Meats.' Alcohol-free sports bar. Sources: samsteakgrill.com, HalalJoints.

name: Sambal
halal_reasoning: Thai/Malaysian restaurant in Irvington. No halal claims found on website or reviews. Owned by same team as Chutney Masala (Indian). Menu includes vegetarian options but no specific halal mention. High-skepticism cuisine type. Sources: sambalny.com, Yelp.

name: Sami's Kabab House
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal Afghan restaurant in Glen Cove. Note says 'Confirmed halal.' Owner Sami Zaman butchers halal lamb himself. BYOB (no alcohol served). Established 2016. Sources: Yelp, samiskababhouse.com.

name: Sami's Kabab House
halal_reasoning: Long Island City location. Note says 'Confirmed halal.' Same owner/concept as Astoria. Afghan cuisine. Sources: Yelp (95 reviews).

name: Sami's Kebab House
halal_reasoning: Astoria flagship location. Note says 'Confirmed halal.' Highly rated Afghan restaurant with 482 reviews on Yelp. Owner butchers halal lamb on-site. BYOB. Sources: Yelp, samiskababhouse.com, Tripadvisor.

name: Samm Halal Food Cart
halal_reasoning: Halal in name. Jamaica location food cart. Consistent with halal cart conventions. Limited specific verification available.

name: Sammay's Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Halal cart at Brighton Beach & Coney Island Ave. Listed on Yelp as food truck. 'Halal' in name. Sources: Yelp.

name: Sammy's Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Award-winning halal cart at 6th Ave & W 4th St. Won Vendy Award for Best Food. Voted 'Best Halal Food in Manhattan.' Open 24/7. Sources: sammyshalal.com, Yelp (136 reviews), Grubhub.

name: Sammy's Halal Food
halal_reasoning: Jackson Heights location at 73rd St & Broadway. Same award-winning brand. Established 2004. First halal cart in Jackson Heights. Open 24/7. Sources: sammyshalalfoodqueens.com, Yelp (466 reviews).

name: Sandy's Celebrations
halal_reasoning: Listed as Halal on Yelp along with desserts, coffee, fresh juice. Coram, NY location. Limited detailed information available. Sources: Yelp listing.

name: Sanjha Bazaar
halal_reasoning: Suffolk's largest South Asian grocery store. Has separate halal meat/butcher section. Also has cafe serving Indian food. Sources: Greater Long Island, Yelp, DoorDash.

name: Santorini Greek Restaurant
halal_reasoning: Greek restaurant listed as Halal on Yelp which is unusual for this cuisine type. Family-owned Mediterranean. Requires verification - Greek restaurants are typically not halal. May have halal options but needs direct confirmation. Sources: Yelp.

name: Sarwari Halal Cart
halal_reasoning: Halal cart at Kissena Blvd & Elder Ave, Flushing. 'Halal' in name suggests halal food. Consistent with halal cart conventions. Limited specific verification.

name: Sauced Up
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal restaurant. Official website halalsaucedup.com. Serves halal chicken/lamb over rice, gyros, wings. Open 10am-2am. Health Score A. Sources: halalsaucedup.com, Yelp, Uber Eats (3000+ ratings).

name: Savory Deli
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal deli in Harlem. Official website savorydeligrocery.com. Known for halal chicken/lamb over rice. Open 24 hours. Sources: savorydeligrocery.com, Yelp (51 reviews).

name: Sayed Deli & Coffee Shop
halal_reasoning: Deli/coffee shop in Huntington Station. No halal claims found in search results. Operating since 2010. Insufficient evidence to determine halal status. Sources: Yelp, Dun & Bradstreet.

name: Sayville Athletic Club
halal_reasoning: American bar/grill with BBQ, burgers, brisket. Serves alcohol (happy hour, Untappd listing). No halal claims found. High-skepticism cuisine type with no halal indicators. Sources: Yelp, Instagram.

name: Serenity Cafe
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal cafe opened August 2024. Official website serenitycafe.us states halal-certified ingredients. Serves American breakfast, sandwiches. Brooklyn location. Sources: serenitycafe.us, Yelp.

name: Shah Hot Chicken
halal_reasoning: Confirmed halal. Serves Pakistani/Middle Eastern/Indian cuisine. Listed among best halal restaurants in White Plains. 4.6 rating on DoorDash. Sources: Yelp, DoorDash.

halal_reasoning: Part of Shah's Halal chain. Certified by Halal Food Council USA. Over 120 locations. Family-owned since 2005. FSIS/USDA inspected. Sources: shahshalalfood.com/certifications, FSIS.usda.gov.
